20110102163459.000|20110102163500.000|CC1|I'VE DONE IT WITH MY OWN MONEY.

20110102163508.000|20110102163511.000|CC1|KEEP RAISING THE DEBT CEILING AS

20110102163553.000|20110102163555.000|CC1|ARE GOING TO BE ABLE TO TURN    
20110102163555.000|20110102163556.000|CC1|THEIR ESSENTIALLY CAMPAIGN      
20110102163556.000|20110102163559.000|CC1|RHETORIC INTO SOME KIND OF      
20110102163559.000|20110102163601.000|CC1|REALITY, BECAUSE WITH ALL DUE   
20110102163601.000|20110102163602.000|CC1|RESPECT TO HIS RESPONSE, THERE  
20110102163602.000|20110102163603.000|CC1|ISN'T ANY THERE THERE.
